015// from https://gist.github.com/lunohodov/1995178 CORRECT??

240        
241        private final int r, g, b;
242        private final String name;
243
244        RalColor(int r, int g, int b) {
245                this.r = r;
246                this.g = g;
247                this.b = b;
248                this.name = null;
249        }
250        
251        RalColor(int rgb, String name) {
252                Color c = new Color(rgb);
253                this.r = c.getRed();
254                this.g = c.getGreen();
255                this.b = c.getBlue();
256                this.name = name;
257        }
258
259        @Override
260        public Color getColor() {
261                return new Color(r, g, b);
262        }
263        
264        public String getName() {
265                return this.name;
266        }
267
268//      public String getRGBString() {
269//              /*
270//               * toHexString will return "0" instead of "00" String.format will not
271//               * 0-pad Strings or Hex Have to do it manually...
272//               */
273//              return String.format("#%s%s%s",
274//                              (r < 0x10 ? "0" : "") + Integer.toHexString(r), (g < 0x10 ? "0"
275//                                              : "") + Integer.toHexString(g), (b < 0x10 ? "0" : "")
276//                                              + Integer.toHexString(b));
277//      }
278                
279        public static Color[] getColors(RalColor... wcols) {
280                Color[] rgbColors = new Color[wcols.length];
281                for (int i = 0; i < wcols.length; i++) {
282                        rgbColors[i] = wcols[i].getColor();
283                }
284                return rgbColors;
285        }
286        
287        public static final Color[] SelectColors =
288                        getColors(
289                                        RAL1004, 
290                                        RAL1026, 
291                                        RAL3020, 
292                                        RAL4006, 
293                                        RAL5002, 
294                                        RAL6037,
295                                        RAL8004
296                                        );
